title: Crime Complaint Report (CCR)
description: Generate an LSPD Crime Complaint Report.

options.label: GANGS — Street gangs, cliques, internal disputes, territory activity, graffiti, and gang-motivated violence or intimidation.
NARCOTICS — Drug distribution, manufacturing, transport, possession or associated financial activity.
VICE — Prostitution, illegal gambling, human trafficking, illicit businesses.
ORGANIZED CRIME — Structured criminal groups engaged in repeat or coordinated felony activity, including money laundering and racketeering.
CAPS — Crimes against persons including assault, armed robbery, and sexual offenses.
OTHER — Any criminal activity not fitting the above categories. Must be clearly identified in the narrative.
